name: Proto Arena
description:
Proto Arena is an experimental Arena game which focuses on fast reflexes and good awareness.

Use the tools you have to dispose of the enemies coming after you.

  • SPHERIC has a wide radius, does high damage but cost a lot to cast.                                  
  • REPEATER is really accurate, low cost and deals moderate damage.                                  
  • Proxy "MINE" can stick to surfaces, has a long cooldown but is a one hit kill.                 
  • You also can pick up and throw objects to deal damage.

Don't underestimate your enemies.

  • SENTINELS are limited in their arsenal and can only damage you if they come into contact with you.                                                                                                                                                 
  • TURRETS are stationary so they are easy targets but get in their sights and you will eat  a lot of damage.                                                                                                                                  
  • DRONES are small so they are tough to nail but as long as you keep moving they won't be able to hit you.
